pe1:33.4_0: Na kiñci buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ dhammadesanāya dhammacakkato bahiddhā,

pe1:119.8_0: Viññāṇaṁ nāmarūpaṁ saḷāyatanaṁ phasso vedanā bhavo jāti jarāmaraṇaṁ, idaṁ dukkhaṁ.
pe1:119.9_0: Avijjā saṅkhārā taṇhā upādānaṁ, ayaṁ samudayo.

pe1:141.7_1: natthi taṁ dukkhaṁ na kāyikaṁ vā na cetasikaṁ,

pe1:141.8_0: Tīhi dukkhatāhi saṅgahitaṁ dukkhadukkhatāya saṅkhāradukkhatāya vipariṇāmadukkhatāya.
